review: I really want to like the Chromecast but I just can't. I can't get one full episode of a show I'm watching to stream from my Chromebook to my Chromecast without it dropping the connection. And that's with the Chromebook, Chromecast, and router all in the same room within 9 feet of each other. My guess is it needs a better wifi antenna. Too bad I can't stream to my Roku.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Young daughter loves it - casting her tablet to TV for YouTube videos. We also have Amazon Prime and use that more for Netflix and Chromecast for casting.

review: Everything worked out great once I figured it out having no directions. I was about ready to return it, when I finally figured it out. I was really frustrated.
